languages.text: {n}Эльдарка выпаливает несколько слов, сопровождая их причудливыми жестами, однако {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Толкователь{/g} не в силах точно передать значение ее слов. Все, что выплевывает из себя переводчик — мешанину слов, включающих в себя "долго и мучительно".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдарка шипит сквозь зубы, однако ваш толкователь не в силах передать значение ее слов. Кажется, она упоминала что-то про "долго и мучительно".{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet spits out a string of words accompanied by a series of elaborate gestures, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is powerless to convey their exact meaning. All the translation device is able to muster is a mishmash of words that includes "long and agonising."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдарка выпаливает несколько слов, сопровождая их причудливыми жестами, однако {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Толкователь{/g} не в силах точно передать значение ее слов. Все, что выплевывает из себя переводчик — мешанину слов, включающих в себя "долго и мучительно".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet spits out a string of words accompanied by odd gestures, but the Elucidator is powerless to convey their exact meaning. All the translation device is able to muster is a mishmash of words that includes "long and agonising".{/n}

{n}Yrliet spits out a string of words accompanied by a series of elaborate gestures, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is powerless to convey their exact meaning. All the translation device is able to muster is a mishmash of words that includes "long and agonising."{/n}

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは巧みな身振り手振りを交えながら言葉を連発するが、{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}エルシデイター{/g}の力だけではその意味を正確に伝えることができない。翻訳機が唯一捉えることができたのは、「長く苦悩が続くように」を含む単語の寄せ集めだけだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet spits out a string of words accompanied by a series of elaborate gestures, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is powerless to convey their exact meaning. All the translation device is able to muster is a mishmash of words that includes "long and agonising."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは巧みな身振り手振りを交えながら言葉を連発するが、{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}エルシデイター{/g}の力だけではその意味を正確に伝えることができない。翻訳機が唯一捉えることができたのは、「長く苦悩が続くように」を含む単語の寄せ集めだけだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特一边吐出了一连串的词语，一边做出一系列复杂的手势，但{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}阐释器{/g}无力传达这些话的确切含义。所有翻译设备都只能翻译成一大堆乱七八糟、晦涩难懂的大杂烩，其中大概包含了“漫长与令人痛苦”的意思。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet spits out a string of words accompanied by a series of elaborate gestures, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is powerless to convey their exact meaning. All the translation device is able to muster is a mishmash of words that includes "long and agonising."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特一边吐出了一连串的词语，一边做出一系列复杂的手势，但{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}阐释器{/g}无力传达这些话的确切含义。所有翻译设备都只能翻译成一大堆乱七八糟、晦涩难懂的大杂烩，其中大概包含了“漫长与令人痛苦”的意思。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet emite una verborrea acompañada de elaborados gestos, pero el {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Dilucidador{/g} es incapaz de transmitir su significado exacto. Dicho aparato de traducción solo logra reunir un batiburrillo de palabras, entre las que se encuentran «largo» y «agonizante».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet spits out a string of words accompanied by a series of elaborate gestures, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is powerless to convey their exact meaning. All the translation device is able to muster is a mishmash of words that includes "long and agonising."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet emite una verborrea acompañada de elaborados gestos, pero el {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Dilucidador{/g} es incapaz de transmitir su significado exacto. Dicho aparato de traducción solo logra reunir un batiburrillo de palabras, entre las que se encuentran «largo» y «agonizante».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet crache une tirade ponctuée de gestes élaborés, mais l'{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}élucidateur{/g} est incapable de traduire ses propos correctement. Il ne parvient qu'à vous proposer un assemblage de mots sans rapport, hormis un « sans fin et sans pitié » qui se détache du lot.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet spits out a string of words accompanied by a series of elaborate gestures, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is powerless to convey their exact meaning. All the translation device is able to muster is a mishmash of words that includes "long and agonising."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet crache une tirade ponctuée de gestes élaborés, mais l'{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}élucidateur{/g} est incapable de traduire ses propos correctement. Il ne parvient qu'à vous proposer un assemblage de mots sans rapport, hormis un « sans fin et sans pitié » qui se détache du lot.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aus Yrliet sprudelt eine Reihe von Worten heraus, begleitet von komplizierten Gesten, aber der {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} ist nicht in der Lage, ihre exakte Bedeutung zu vermitteln. Das Übersetzungsgerät gibt lediglich einen Mischmasch von Worten von sich, in denen "lange" und "qualvoll" vorkommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet spits out a string of words accompanied by a series of elaborate gestures, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is powerless to convey their exact meaning. All the translation device is able to muster is a mishmash of words that includes "long and agonising."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus Yrliet sprudelt eine Reihe von Worten heraus, begleitet von komplizierten Gesten, aber der {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} ist nicht in der Lage, ihre exakte Bedeutung zu vermitteln. Das Übersetzungsgerät gibt lediglich einen Mischmasch von Worten von sich, in denen "lange" und "qualvoll" vorkommen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, birtakım teferruatlı el kol hareketlerinin eşlik ettiği bir dizi sözcük sarf etse de {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Aydınlatıcı{/g}, bunların asıl anlamını iletmekte yetersiz kalıyor. Çeviri cihazının tek yapabildiği, aralarında "uzun ve acı verici" gibi ifadelerin bulunduğu karmaşık bazı sözcükler sıralamak.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet spits out a string of words accompanied by a series of elaborate gestures, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is powerless to convey their exact meaning. All the translation device is able to muster is a mishmash of words that includes "long and agonising."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, bazı detaylı el kol hareketlerinin eşlik ettiği bir dizi sözcük sarf ediyor ancak {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Aydınlatıcı{/g} bunların asıl anlamını iletmek konusunda yeterli gelmiyor. Çeviri cihazının tek yapabildiği karmaşık bazı sözcükler sıralamak. Bunların arasında "uzun ve acı verici" gibi şeyler var.{/n}
